column4: you can't do this by default in Ubuntu. It worked (doesn't any more) in Windows because the Messenger service was running on both computers by default. Ubuntu doesn't expose any services to the network by default
ok but i need just in one direction from me to windows
Try http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=353413 . Bear in mind that it won't work with most recent versions of Windows by default.
